website_summaries.verdict: A pricier version with a wider net designed for a 60-inch backboard.
pros: It has a tough, polyethylene netting that has a thickness of 3 millimeters, compared to the 2.5-millimeter thickness of the Silver
Rolbak offers a 90-day warranty period where they replace faulty parts at no additional cost
cons: It's not as durable as advertised  and the assembly instructions are poorly worded and illustrated

customer_reviews.title: Net is great for shooting, but leaky tube is no fun
customer_reviews.text: Net works great, however the refillable tube was leaking from day one. Water leaks out of tube in a couple of days. They provide patches for the tube, but since it leaked so quickly I’ll probably just add grommets and bolt it down.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Rolbak Gold Foldable Basketball Net
customer_reviews.text: This BBALL net saves me lots of time running after the ball while playing with my son, very happy with it at the moment , will see how the quality holds up over time, we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: TheSprilla

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough
customer_reviews.text: The net is not long enough. The ball is always hitting the base, and it bounces every direction if it hits the base.
customer_reviews.author: Triton822

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, only lasts a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: The item only lasted about 2 months, the water bag has a huge leak, and the net is ripping at the seams as shown in the picture. Disappointed, I expected it to last at least a year before I started seeing any of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Ali

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions very poor.
customer_reviews.text: Cross bar which is supposed to hold the net broke on both ends while trying to assemble. Assembly instructions very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Net gets in the way....
customer_reviews.text: The net sticks so far out that you can't even shoot a layin. Wish I could return it. But I bought it in the winter, for Christmas, and the snow just cleared enough to set up. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Camisha Hughbanks

customer_reviews.title: Great IDEA, but not durable...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Gold Rolback Net about two and a half years ago. I live in Indiana and therefore store the Rolback net in my heated garage during the winter. This is my problem: regardless of the extra care given to this product, I already have 5 "breaks" in the netting at various locations. I love the product, but I can't afford to replace it for $100, every couple of years. The warranty is only for one year, therefore the cost is on the owner's shoulders. Richard
customer_reviews.author: R. MURPHY

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well thought-out
customer_reviews.text: Replaced one that I bought directly from Rolback in 2005 which survived being left out all 11 years through rain, snow, ice, and heat waves. Looks and feels as sturdy with changes mainly in fasteners and base design. I just attach the two bottom ends to anchors at the end of the driveway, net sloping away toward the back. But for more active use and safety as designed choose the type of anchor to suit the environment. Perfect for ball return and keeping them from rolling into the neighbors; just don't run into it or fight for rebounds if you use it as pictured sloping forward.
customer_reviews.author: Wash15

customer_reviews.title: works Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, works good easy setup, keeps the ball in play. have had it for 3 summers and still works great
customer_reviews.author: SYDOK

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Two days after installing the net, the water bag started leading through the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The concept is good, but the quality of the net itself needs improvement...
customer_reviews.text: It dos what it's supposed to do. However, my son's friend who weighs about 65lbs fell on the net, and the metal pieces that attaches to the end of the rod broke!! I saw an earlier review that mentioned this. Its a piece that's been poorly welded together. Also, part of the net has been ripped thus far. The concept is good, but the quality of the net itself needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Romy E.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Installed fairly easily, good instructions. Kids like not having to chase the ball any more. Seems like it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leisure

customer_reviews.title: A+ product
customer_reviews.text: I received the gold net and really like it no more chasing the basketball here. The kids love it, very easy to install and the ball comes right back for a quick return no more chasing the ball. Thanks a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jojo2014

customer_reviews.title: ... the yard doesbt really have level ground my kids love this the ball comes directly back to them no ...
customer_reviews.text: I live on a farm where the yard doesbt really have level ground my kids love this the ball comes directly back to them no problems at all. It was also very easy to install as I am not very good at putting things together and I was able to do so with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica seeley

customer_reviews.title: Rolbak Net Gold Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use for basketball practice. It was fairly simple to install with the instructions provided. It works great, especially when she's practicing her free-throws.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C. Pieratt

product_meta.title: Rolbak Gold Foldable Basketball Return Net with 1 Refillable Water Tube, Webbing Harness and Nylon Brackets
product_meta.description: Keep your basketball inside your court and away from plants, windows, or anything else near the basketball hoop so you can focus on making winning shots and spend less time chasing after the ball. This Rolbak net can be easily attached to the back of the basketball rim via a webbing harness or to the bottom extension arms of your basketball system using nylon brackets. The high tensile netting catches missed shots and rolls them safely back to you. Whats more, this defensive net system is designed with arms and net that easily fold on the main pole for discreet storage. This system is also secured to the ground using a refillable water tube and can be installed easily so its up and running in just a few minutes! Basketball backboard and hoop sold separately. Shipping is included when you buy from Dazadi plus a 90-day warranty.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR YOUR EXISTING BASKETBALL SYSTEM - The Gold Rolbak return net is suitable for 60-inch wide backboard. (Sold Separately)

SPEND LESS TIME CHASING AFTER BASKETBALLS - Save yourself from running after missed shots. Ideal for shooting free throws or jump shooting either solo or with friends. Basketball rebound net dimensions: 10 L x 5 W feet.

QUICK AND EASY SET UP - This return basketball net easily attaches to the back of your basketball rim via a webbing harness or to your basketball systems bottom extension arms using nylon brackets. Can also be secured to the ground using a high-quality, refillable water tube.

DURABLE NETTING AND DISCREET STORAGE - This basketball system accessory has a tough, polyethylene netting that has a thickness of 3 millimeters - capable of withstanding forceful hits and long hours of play. This defensive net system is also designed with arms and net that easily fold on the main pole for discreet storage.

WARRANTY - Your product will arrive with all the necessary parts, without defect and/or shipping damage. Well ship new replacement parts or an entire replacement table at no cost. If you still arent satisfied, well give you a full refund. All our items ship for free to your door, but we also offer in-home delivery and assembly for an added fee. During the 90-day limited warranty period, we shall repair or replace defective parts at no cost to the purchaser.
